title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Seen It All: “95 percent probability” of Dorian’s path going through Alabama, “but then it made that right turn that a lot of people didn’t expect.” -- Donald Trump The NWS issued the correction only twenty minutes after Trump's false alarm, had issued both an 8AM and 11AM update, so Trump can't claim he even knew current information regarding the storm's projected path. At no time did EMA or Miami NHC indicate a 95% or even a 10% probability of the storm gong across the state, into the Gulf and hitting Alabama. Model tracking has indicated a northward turn for the last four days. Face it - Trump can't read a map and clearly spent time playing golf, tweeting and watching Fox and Friends instead of monitoring the storm's progress. The fact that he had never heard of a category 5 storm despite this being the fourth one since he took office is clear evidence of his failing memory and mental capacity.
